title: We were warned not to go

comments.comment: Used to watch pewds when I was still in school…now I’m married with two kids and still watch him. I’ve changed but He’s changed as well and I love it. This kind of chill content is hard to find on YouTube these days…I never get this nostalgic feeling watching anyone other than felix
These vlogs are so much fun. Marzia's editing style really adds that chef's kiss to the whole thing.
Pewd's personality on camera and commentary + Marzia's amazing editing + Japan being Japan. Man this vlogs are fire. They really shows the best of both of you, i love them.

Damn these videos make me realise how beautiful Japan is. I especially liked the guardians, they were all so pretty and the idea of them protecting children is just so sweet. These vids make me wanna visit Japan some day.

All the music Marzia used (in order)

0:00 - Sarah, the Illstrumentalist - Beach Day in Brooklyn

I love how Pewds is enjoying his life with his wife and dogs and how he always wanted to be in Japan, watching his vlogs are the best
The editing on this video got me feeling nostalgic lol. It's nice to take a break from the usual garbage on youtube and watch this man just live life

Growing up as a child and then teenager watching Pewdiepie, I always loved his content. And now I'm nearly 21 and loving his vlogs and chilled videos, we've both grown up and matured over the years and even though I don't watch any vlog videos, or much youtube in general anymore, watching these feels nostalgic and fun. He's 'retired' and loving his success and new life, and as we see in the comments on every single one of these videos, we're all so happy for him.
Literally my favourite era of pewdiepie. I appreciate these vlogs so much
I love how genuine these vlogs are. He is just having fun and living life in Japan and we get to come along for the ride. The editing is so cozy as well.
Jazz, Japan, and Felix... my day is complete
I love Marzia's style of editing vlogs. Looks even better for Japan one's
The sense of calm and peace this type of content fills me with is unreal
Marzia's music selection for these videos is usually S-tier, but this time... if there was anything beyond S-tier I would rate it that.

I’m so happy for you guys, being able to enjoy your success without a stampede, having a quiet night out and enjoying the small things must be so refreshing. Well done Pewds….
so lovely to keep seeing marzia's touches in the editing and also little glimpses of her cute outfits in the vlogs <3

I haven´t enjoyed many youtube videos these days, but every single Vlog of yours gets me excited every time. It´s just so much fun to see you guys enjoy your life in Japan and thanks for taking all of us along.
I love the little quiet moments of them walking and not talking and all you hear is the pugs breathing

I keep thinking back to that first surf vid, when Felix recounted the instructors lesson.  He got upset over missing a wave, and the instructor said don't do that.  There will be another one.  

It's such a transcendent little piece of advice.. I've been feeling it as a constant reminder not to let the little things frustrate me lately.  

So many gems in these vlogs.  Brings me a lot of joy
Japan feels so calm, these videos feel calm. I need this.
As both a fan of Pewds and One Piece, Pewds started watching OP brings happiness to me. Cant wait for him to talk about it in his videos one day.
I love that Pewds stayed true to his roots, and kept the 480p camera quality from his old videos and brought it outside in Japan
日本の日常がとても美しく映されていて、日本人として、とても嬉しいです。日本へようこそ！日本を楽しんでくださいね！

These videos lately are so amazing I love the calm vibe and how aestheticly pleasing they are  I honestly get so happy and just feel wya better after watching of these videos
If Japan's Tourist Board doesn't hire you as their new spokesman, I dunno what they're doing. These videos are all so beautifully done that anyone watching will want to visit Japan in their lifetime.

A country that is on my bucketlist to go to with my fiance, she had a serious tumour in her back in 2016 and went trough some really tough chemo + a 20h surgery, and shes been struggeling with a lot of side effects afterwords that has been putting us on hold, when shes good enough to go, Japan is the nr1 country we will travel to, thank you for these vlogs we really appreciate them!
Love how he’s retired and just living everyone’s best life now
These vlogs just make me happy. Thank you Felix
It's safe to say that these Vlogs with PewDiePie in Japan with Marcie's editing is the most anticipated content in this channel hands down! Keep them coming you two!

These videos are really THE best to watch, they're so chill and it's just relaxing to watch Pewds live and enjoy his life in Japan. The editing on these videos are like you're watching a 10/10 slice of life anime and gives lofi vibes off.

I love this new pewds
as felix walks through Japan it feels  so euphoric and hyper realistic in a strange way  or is it just me

この季節は日本人も外にはあまり出なくなりますし、今年の夏は異常なので体調には気を付けてくださいね。

あと1ヶ月もすると外で楽しむには最高の季節になります、景色も美味しいご飯も更に楽しめますね。
Watching these genuine and heartwarming vlogs by Pewds is such a relief. This is how a vlog should be.

To be honest, this is the highlight of my day ( even tho that sounds sad) This is the best content you ever uploaded. It was always hard for me to understand youtube videos cuz i could not relate. But when you are just yourself and no persona, its so much better. Much love from Norway ^__^

Those statues in 10:23 are called jizo statues. it’s a cemetery for unborn children. The rows and rows of jizo statues represent the souls of children who died before birth. Parents use the statues as a way to say farewell and ease the child’s passage into the afterlife.

It’s so crazy how you’ve been a part of my childhood and now i’m leaving for Air Force BMT in two weeks. It makes me happy knowing that when I come back for this next chapter in life, that you will still continue to be here spreading joy. Thank you for everything Felix ️

i can’t get over these vlogs they’re so cute and they feel so classic like i’m watching an episode in the life of felix AND marzia. as little as she’s in these vlogs i feel like we get back a touch of her ️
10:00 Those little statues are called Jizo and are meant to protect children and the souls of unborn babies and children who died before their parents.
[Another comment about how nice it is to see Pewds enjoy himself in japan and how these VLOGs are great and that he should keep posting them]
Love that you marked your milestone of moving to Japan with a Grand Seiko. Too many people buy watches to flex. Lovely to see someone attaching memories to them
These edits are immaculate the chill vibes are through the roof feels like hanging out with an old friend

Felix, Marzia, thank you for showing the Lantern festival and just exploring while living and even visiting in Japan. My home country is always fun to visit and just the sense of nostalgia seeing everything again even if it’s on a video really makes me happy that you two are enjoying things there. A lot has changed over the years including a lot of prefectures being westernized, however, some still keeps the old traditions and the sense of being in the old times really makes you feel peaceful when you visit there.
Felix looks the happiest I have ever seen him. I cant wait to retire too lmaoo.
thank you Marzia, I love the new videos they're helping me de-stress at a time I really need it.

I'm a bit scared to go to a foreign country with a very different culture, but your videos are making me reconsider a lot.
He seems so lucky to have this life, a wife, 2 dogs- can go to japan and eat whatever cool thing he wants, can have a nice home and be healthy. Have a ton of fans. What a man.
I wish people could see how much Pewd's channel has grown ️ it's just wholesome and relaxing. Keep doing what you love pewds
I’m so happy for PewDiePie, being able to enjoy your success without a stampede, having a quiet night out and enjoying the small things,you are good guy.

Pewds and Marzia are international treasures.

Zozoji temple! That’s one of the coolest temples in Japan I think, not because of any special design or historical significance, just because it looks really awesome next to Tokyo Tower. My band actually played a concert there a couple of years back as part of a kind of arts festival. A really memorable experience.

"I pre-heated the car" I was a bit worried for a second but then I realize he meant chilled the car/turned the AC on LOL
Also for some reason it makes me really happy to hear that Pewds is watching One Piece, absolute blast, cant wait to hear him talk about Alabaster/Skyland etc (hopefully)

These are By far my favorite vlogs on YT right now. I’ve been a bro since 2012 and I don’t think I’ve ever seen Felix so at peace and so chill. The vlogs fill me with joy and peace, keep up the amazing work.
Lets go!! 13:45 First classic JDM car Pewds showed in his vlogs, and its an R33!!

Love the vlogs pewds. I have been living here for 8 years. Hope you make your way to Nagoya some time. A word of advice, you shouldn't film inside any temples, especially the boddhivista statues, you may get kicked out. The one in the video is Amida Nyorai 1 of 13 boddhivistas of the Shingon sect of Japanese Buddhism.
The many small statues outside are called Jizo Bosatsu the guardian of children, in this situation however they have a sad meaning they represent lost children who have passed. Please up vote so Pewds sees.

Seeing these vlogs in Japan is making me want to visit again. Was there there this June with friends and absolutely loved it, can’t wait to go back next year. Such an awesome place with some of the friendliest and nicest people. Went to the same Zōjō-ji Temple in this video and then Tokyo Tower right after. Japan is super pretty. Would love to live there one day

You probably already know: get the barbell to actually touch your chest, then lift. The benefits come from The Entire Extension, AND notably, ON THE WAY DOWN. If it's too much weight right now, be patient, do less weight. Bad reps will not help you much, and Bad form can lead to injury. (you probably already know all this), but you're doing A Great Job on the workouts, keep it up dude! What's your protein powder, creatine, vitamin regimen like? If not already doing protein powder and creatine, CHECK, IT, OUT brother. You will get more from your workouts.

These Japan vlogs are the best PewDiePie content I have seen since the introduction of BARRELS! Honestly love this series and am happy to see Pewds and Marzia just doing what makes them happy. 

The edits are perfect. The vibe is unmatched. These are the best vlogs on the internet!

Everytime I go on lunch at work I always watch your videos to get my mind off at how hectic work is. I get so happy when you post a new video and today I caught it just in time for my lunch. Thank you Pewds and Marzia for your lovely videos ️

Honestly this is the best shift of video content. Having grown up watching pewds from literally like 10 to now 23 is amazing. Love that he’s living his life in Japan and is enjoying every second of it. Key earned it. Enjoy “retirement”
I cannot express how much enjoyment these vlogs bring me. I hadn't been watching Felix in a while, but I wait in anticipation for these Japan vlogs ever day. I love them so much

i’ve been watching pewds since 2011 and i remember being at a friend of mine and her grandma would get very angry when watching him because he used to swear a lot and be too loud, just like how i was back then. Watching him ever since, growing up and maturing along side his content and pretty much himself i could say feels like i’ve had this friend over-broads. I know this seems a bit self centered and that im one in the 110 million people that watch him, but i am happy that i have been part of this community either way and can’t be more proud of us, felix, marzia, edgar and maya for making this corner of youtube a pleasant place to be. Can’t wait to see what the future has in store!
my favorite is when he compliments marzia's cooking :3 so cute
I love to watch every week in the evening pewds having the time of his life, relaxed and don't give a shit about the grind, wish this phase of his life will never end.

Can’t believe I’ve been watching you since I was in 6th grade now I’m 21 with my first child on the way life is crazy I hope you’re enjoying ever bit of it pewds you look happy!

I appreciate these videos Pewds. I lived in Japan for a few years, then had to move back to the States for my job. I love watching the videos and being like, I've been there, or saw that or wishing I had gone to it. I'm looking forward to going back, even for a visit,  some day.
Man I remember watching him play octodad I have never been more happy to see my favorite YouTuber live his best life, thank you Felix for inspiring me to succeed and remember to brofist
It's so good to see pewds and his family just living their best life. He's earned days of peace and happiness.
Imagine being a multi-millionaire living in Japan. This guy is living the dream

14:05 Well honestly, the rep doesn’t count. But you’re strong enough to get it soon and fixing your form will get you there.

You’ve gotta keep your butt on the bench throughout the lift and the bar has to touch your chest before coming back up. Form a slight arch with your back, keep your scapulas down and retracted, place your feet behind your knees (feet closer than knees are to your head). Bring the bar down in a slight curve away from your head. Once the bar touches your chest, push your legs into the floor and drive your butt back towards your head as your push the bar in the same motion. I recommend doing pause reps; once the bar is on your chest, hold it there for a second while maintaining tension before pushing back up.

I've always loved vlogging content from Felix over the years, not just these recent ones. But the editing also takes me back to watching Marzia's videos as well - both of their content was part of my routine growing up through my teenage to young adult years. These videos feel nostalgic in that sense despite being new. I'm loving this style content and I'm so happy to see both Felix and Marzia living their dream life.

Even after all this time, Marzia's wishes to step down from the platform have continued to be respected, even in their own vlogs. We see her back, or her feet, but the camera stays focusing on Felix, the dogs or the area around them. Which is still oddly wholesome.

As someone who loves Japanese culture and desperately wishes to visit, I love seeing glimpses through these vlogs and look forward to seeing them pop up in my notifications.
We'll never get this type of vlogs when he lived in UK just so nice to see him enjoy making these types of videos and taking us on he's japanese journey with Marzia, Edgar and Maya

to see Pewds happiness amplify since he moved to japan and the vibe he gives he is absolutely so peaceful now! i never thought it’d feel amazing to watch a blog as much as it does with Pewds vlogs. i liked them before but seeing him happy is so awesome!

I come from your hometown in Gothenburg and driving past your old flat in Partille next to Allum feels so nostalgic. Keep doing you, much love

14:37 That's Cumulonimbus Cloud which are associates with extreme/bad weather, like heavy precipitation, hail, thunderstorm,lightning or even tornadoes. 

When you see this type of clouds, it's best to seek shelter inside a building. Fibrous upper edges and anvil shape top. It's very hard to identify when you're near it just like when Felix heard the Thunder. It's really blueish dark base. 

I'm glad he did vlogs cause he seems to be enjoying it and I learn quite a lot from it.
Happy noises when Felix complements Marzia <3  those guardians of children were incredible

I can’t believe that you guys live in Japan.
I really hope to meet you somewhere one day 

Love you guys

14:09 your form looks good man, you just need to add more depth to your benching. Try to aim for the bar touching, and then resting on your ribs for about a second and then press up for proper, strict form. Keep it up broe
